jersey dress.description: Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey. Short sleeves, seam at waist, and softly draped, gently flared skirt. Unlined.

denim shorts.description: Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, button fly, and raw-edge hems.

denim skirt.description: Short skirt in washed cotton denim. High waist, zip fly with button, front and back pockets, and raw-edge hem.

sneakers.description: Sneakers with lacing at front and lightly padded edge and tongue. Mesh lining and fabric insoles.

sunglasses.description: Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
